thread.section_title: Endoca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Endoca | www.endoca.com
thread.title: Lord Michael G
thread.title_full: Endoca reviewed by Lord Michael G

author: Lord Michael G
title: Lord Michael G
text:
The product was great.
However, based on my online browsing I was expecting the internal packaging to appear more like mainstream chewing gum lines, more "legit" if you will, with the plastic and foil packaging that you can "pop" the product out of, and therefore easier to offer in public.
I understand that your brand is going for a completely biodegradable product, and that is alright with me, I respect and admire that.
